body:
This isn't urgent. It blocks #1091, but that is a front-end issue that I think isn't likely to get fixed until Delivery Console is up and running (though that's really @rehandalal's call).

That being said, it would be nice if you were up to speed enough to work on Normandy stuff soon, and to me review is a good way to do that.

body_html:
This isn't urgent. It blocks #1091, but that is a front-end issue that I think isn't likely to get fixed until Delivery Console is up and running (though that's really @rehandalal's call).

That being said, it would be nice if you were up to speed enough to work on Normandy stuff soon, and to me review is a good way to do that.
